text: Shinkō no nai mono wa,`(shinpan no)-ji wa, watashi-tachi ni wa konaidearou.' To iu. Itte yaru ga ī. `Iya, omo ni chikatte, sore wa kanarazu anata gata ni yattekuru nodearu. Yūgen-kai made mo shitte ora reru omo ni chikatte. Ten ni oite mo ji ni oite mo, mijin no omo-sa demo, kare kara manukare rareru mono wanai. Mata sore yori chīsai mono mo ōkī mono mo, meikakuna sho ni shirusa renai mono wanai
